rows.label: qev050202_MSG0001
rows.name: Why have you come here, human?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050202_MSG0002
rows.name: I am busy. State your business or be on your way.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050202_JNK0010
rows.name: Reply

rows.label: qev050202_SEL0011
rows.name: Tell Zo Zazhi that her brother sent you.

rows.label: qev050202_JNK0020
rows.name: Query

rows.label: qev050202_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask Zo Zazhi what SHE is doing here.

rows.label: qev050202_MSG0003
rows.name: Hmph. Meddlesome whelp.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050202_MSG0004
rows.name:
His concern comes from a place of kindness,
but I will not be moved by the words of a weakling.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050202_MSG0005
rows.name:
If you wish for me to listen, go to the Jair Fortress
and slay Siphon Qmoeva and Vanitas Seidr.
And move swiftly! I will not abide here long.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050202_MSG0006
rows.name: Hmph. I need not explain my duty to a weakling.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050202_MSG0007
rows.name:
...Zo Langra sent you? That changes nothing.
If you would prove me wrong and have me listen,
I have a task for you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050202_MSG0008
rows.name:
Go to the Jair Fortress and slay Siphon Qmoeva and
Vanitas Seidr. And move swiftly! I shall not wait long.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050202_MSG0009
rows.name: Further discussion can continue after you are done.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050202_MSG0010
rows.name:
I have no time for the weak, even if you were sent by
my brother.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050202_MSG0011
rows.name:
If you cannot defeat Siphon Qmoeva and Vanitas Seidr
in a suitably short time, you had best head home to
your kind's city.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050202_MSG0012
rows.name:
Well? Have you slain Siphon Qmoeva
and Vanitas Seidr?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050202_MSG0013
rows.name: ...I see. It seems Langra did not send a total amateur.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050202_MSG0014
rows.name:
You should serve as a suitable warm-up before my
fight with the Ganglion assassin.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050202_MSG0015
rows.name:
Draw your weapon! If you would drag me back home,
you must do so by force.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050202_MSG0016
rows.name:
And do not hold back, for the last princess of
House Zo will not be easily tamed![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050202_JNK0030
rows.name: Soothe

rows.label: qev050202_SEL0031
rows.name: Calm Zo Zazhi by assuring her you only came to talk.

rows.label: qev050202_JNK0040
rows.name: Accept

rows.label: qev050202_SEL0041
rows.name: Draw your weapon and challenge Zo Zazhi.

rows.label: qev050202_MSG0017
rows.name:
Coward! I have no intention of listening to you babble,
or of going home.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050202_MSG0018
rows.name:
Not until I have cleaved the one who killed my brothers
in twain and bathed in his blood.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050202_MSG0019
rows.name:
I had hoped to get a bit of exercise, but I see that is
folly. If you have no will to fight, then turn your tail
and run home.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050202_MSG0020
rows.name:
And tell my brother to stop worrying!
I will return with that monster's head in hand.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050202_MSG0021
rows.name: I have nearly found him. I cannot give up now.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050202_MSG0022
rows.name:
Dreams of revenge were all that helped me survive
years of servitude under the Ganglion.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050202_MSG0023
rows.name: You show spirit. But do not think you can stop me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050202_MSG0024
rows.name:
I shall not lose to you OR him. And until I have justice
for my fallen brothers, I will not be defeated![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050202_MSG0025
rows.name: I have not given up. I will train until I can defeat you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050202_MSG0026
rows.name:
And then I will crush the assassin, throw down
the Ganglion, and bring my brothers peace.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050202_MSG0027
rows.name:
My brothers' killer is somewhere out here in Oblivia...
And I will find him![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050202_MSG0028
rows.name:
Tell my little brother to stop worrying.
I will return with that monster's head in hand.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050202_MSG0029
rows.name:
I am close to finding my brothers' killer now, human.
So very close.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050202_MSG0030
rows.name:
If you would stand in my way, I will cut you down.
But if that does not still your tongue,
then state your business.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050202_MSG0032
rows.name:
Th-these are...my brothers' swords.
But why do you have them?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050202_JNK0050
rows.name: Explain

rows.label: qev050202_SEL0051
rows.name: Calmly inform Zo Zazhi of her family's wishes.

rows.label: qev050202_JNK0060
rows.name: Urge

rows.label: qev050202_SEL0061
rows.name:
Passionately explain to Zo Zazhi that
everyone is worried about her.

rows.label: qev050202_MSG0033
rows.name: Rgh... *sniff*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050202_MSG0034
rows.name: AAAAAAAAUGH! BROTHERS![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050202_MSG0035
rows.name:
They were strict teachers. Exacting. Demanding.
But their care for me was always clear.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050202_MSG0036
rows.name:
They threw themselves before the assassin so
Zo Langra and I might escape. They...died for us.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050202_MSG0037
rows.name:
And now it is my turn. Even if the cost is my life,
I refuse to live on in shame.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050202_MSG0038
rows.name:
That bastard will taste the sword taught to me by my
brothers![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050202_MSG0039
rows.name: Now stand aside, or I will cut open my own path.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050202_MSG0040
rows.name: I have not given up. I will train until I can defeat you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050202_MSG0041
rows.name:
And then I will crush the assassin, throw down
the Ganglion, and bring my brothers peace.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050202_MSG0042
rows.name: You...defeated him?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050202_MSG0043
rows.name:
RRRAAAAAUUUGH! He was mine to kill!
I was to claim vengeance with my own hands![ST:wait ]
